group_1.textRight: ...She seems kinda grumpy, but I'm wondering @did something happen?

group_1.textLeft: Is it related to the Blue Seas Family?

group_1.textRight: Ah, is that why we were called in so suddenly?
Umm...it's all...my fault...

group_1.textLeft: Your fault, Kako...?
Now I'm curious.

group_1.textRight: You see...
You have business, yes?

group_1.textLeft: It's from everyone in the Blue Seas Family. @Something they left to me.

group_1.textRight: From everyone? @Why would they leave such a task to you, Kako?
I am fine being handed things directly.

group_1.textLeft: Because it's special
something to change into and show your friends.

group_1.textRight: Something to change into and show would be... @Clothing, yes?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...umm, I'm positive it was like... @Martial arts wear? I think it was called.

group_1.textRight: Martial arts wear...! @That is delightful!

group_1.textLeft: Please head to my room and change.
I'll let Nanaka and everyone know.

group_1.textRight: And then, she went and changed her clothes...

group_1.textLeft: Into that getup...

group_1.textRight: Yes...

group_1.textLeft: And whereabouts would be the combat @part of this uniform?
Do you hold certainty that this @was called martial arts wear?

group_1.textRight: Eh-?

group_1.textLeft: Don't tell me...
You weren't handed "marital arts wear", @were you?
Apparel you wear when motivation is needed @for dates and such, yes.
Have you never read such novels before?

group_1.textRight: ...I have. And I'm aware of what it means...
Why did I have to make a mistake like that... @I'm so embarrassed...

group_1.textLeft: W-well... @I couldn't imagine the words date dress
coming from the mouth of someone @in the Blue Seas Family.

group_1.textRight: ...I'm so sorry.
Meiyui... @I've made you angry, haven't I?

group_1.textLeft: (It is not that I am angry, no...)
(The moment I opened the package @I knew this was no combat wear.)
(It's just different than my normal @that I've become a little embarrassed...)
(I do like it just as it is though.)
(If I didn't, I would not have gone to such lengths @changing my hair...)

group_1.textRight: Uu... @I'm terribly sorry...

group_1.textLeft: (It is difficult to say though...)

group_1.textRight: Since you've gone through the trouble of @changing into appealing attire,
would you like to go on a @date with the three of us?

group_1.textLeft: Going out with good friends is a date as well.

group_1.textRight: I'm with her! @You're already dressed, so let's enjoy ourselves.

group_1.textLeft: (You both have spared me...!)

group_1.textRight: But...

group_1.textLeft: I too wish to go on a date, yes. @I cannot let such date wear go to waste.

group_1.textRight: ...You're not angry?

group_1.textLeft: From the beginning there was no anger.
It's just...something @I have yet grown accustomed to...

group_1.textRight: Ahh... @She wasn't grumpy, just bein' shy.
Huhu...
Please excuse me... @This was all my mistake...

group_1.textLeft: No apologies are necessary, yes? @More importantly, how do I look?

group_1.textRight: Right...! @You're very cute...!

group_1.textLeft: Many thanks, Kako.
